QuestData.Title: Crossroads Caravan Pickup
QuestData.Description: <Halga grins disarmingly, holding up an enormous firearm.>$B$BHave you ever used one of these, $n? It's a beast. Hell with a handgrip. Too heavy to use on foot, but perfect when riding at the head of a caravan. I call it my 'street sweeper.'$B$BWe need to get those supplies you've collected to the Crossroads, and I expect trouble. I'd like for you to ride shotgun. Literally! Say the word when you're ready and I'll put you at the head of our next caravan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Halga Bloodeye at Far Watch Post to escort the next Crossroads Caravan to Grol'dom Farm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Mok'ra, stranger. Are you here from Far Watch?
QuestData.RewardText: You're a sight, $r. That's the first caravan to make it through this week!
